command.name: Undo
command.summary: Undos the last change you made. (Only database modification can be undone)
command.extra: For command-line users, you are advised to call a list/refresh operation after every change to database.

command.name: Done
command.summary: Marks the task specified by index as done.
command.extra: Obtain the "index" number from the list. "index" will be based on last shown list.

command.name: Undone
command.summary: Marks the task specified by index as undone.
command.extra: Obtain the "index" number from the list. "index" will be based on last shown list.

command.name: Add
command.extra: If DoIt misinterprets, use "": add "read book from page 1000 to 1100" by Friday.
